title: Launcher
body: Does anyone else think its unnecessary if you're logged in for awhile, then have to re-log to play a match?

replies.body: Do you have to relog after letting your client sit minimized, or is this after your PC has gone to sleep or hibernation? If the latter, this is normal behavior, but if this only happens when the client is idle, it's definitely something that can be addressed by the guide that *Rineyy* linked.
Thanks for the reply, i'm pretty sure it's the client not my internet because it didn't do it in the past.

What specific error message or behavior are you seeing that prompts you to relog? Additionally, if you have a screenshot and can upload it to a host site like Imgur or Gyazo, it would give me more context on this. Thanks!
I don't use either sites. But it prompts me to re-log after "disconnection" after some time of being logged in. I don't know if this is some sort of a security measure or what. Very irritating.

In this case, it does sound like your client is experiencing an unstable connection to the PvP.net platform. I definitely recommend working through the connection guide that *Rineyy* linked. While you're not aware of any networking changes that may have been made, there are a number of network factors out of your control that could have. 

Let me know if you continue to see issues after working through those steps.

If you need to relog to play after a while it's likely due to an unstable network. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
